# MyTimezone - Time Zone Converter & Meeting Scheduler

## About

MyTimezone is a simple tool for displaying international working hours, easy to share â€” for individuals, teams, or organizations.

Designed with a clear interface, flexible customization, and easy embedding, MyTimezone helps you work globally without timezone barriers.

**URL:** https://mytimezone.online

**Author:** Son Piaz (https://x.com/sonxpiaz)

## Main Features

- Unified timeline view for multiple cities
- Smart search with abbreviations (SF, NYC, HCM)
- Meeting scheduler to find the best time for everyone
- Works on phone and desktop
- Shareable links
- No account needed
- Completely free, no ads

## Key Pages

- Home: https://mytimezone.online/
- About: https://mytimezone.online/about
- Embed Widget: https://mytimezone.online/embed

## How It Works

Add cities, and it shows you their local times on one timeline. When it's 9am in San Francisco, you can see it's 5pm in London and 1am tomorrow in Singapore.

There's also a meeting scheduler that finds times when everyone is awake during reasonable hours.

## Embedding

You can embed a live timezone widget on your website, Notion page, or blog. Use the "Get Embed Code" button on the About page or visit https://mytimezone.online/?openEmbed=true

## Technical Details

- Built with React 19 + TypeScript
- Uses Luxon for timezone handling
- PWA support (works offline)
- Responsive design (mobile-first)
- No tracking, no ads, completely free
